input_args.passage: 'Great Heathen Army | The name Great Heathen Army is derived from the Anglo-Saxon Chronicle. The force was led by three of the five sons of the semi-legendary Ragnar Lodbrok, ...'
input_args.claim: 'Given the common historical practice of regional forces being named after or associated with their founders or significant leaders, it is likely that the West Saxon forces were associated with or named after Cerdic and Cynric.'
